title: Menkui!
description:
1. Apron Attack!!: "Shuu Sakata comes home after a long day of work, only to find his wife Reiko in a naked apron!"

2-5. Shujin to Maid to 2-gou-chan (Maid & Master & #2-chan): "When Masaru Satou's childhood friend, Akina Shidou, finds the hidden maid costume in his closet, she tries it on, only to lead up to having to obey her master, Masaru-kun!"

6. Menkui!*: A story between a fierce girl name Manami Ichijou, and a kind boy named Shou Umezawa.

7. Nayamashi Sisters (Troublesome Sisters): Story between Akito Hiiragi and his two sisters.

8. Nayamashi Lover (Troublesome Lover): 
9. Nayamashi Trio (Troublesome Trio)
10. Trouble Position
11. Ubu na Kankei (Innocent Relations)
12. Sister or Lover
Bonus: Menkui! After
Bonus: Menkui! Toranoana Limited Edition Omake**

*: An extra story can be found in[m]Harem Time[/m], Menkui! in Resort
**: Limited extra for those who bought the volume on Toranoana
